name: Little Thorns
description:
Little Thorns is a school project developed by students following, the 'International Game Architecture and Design' course at the NHTV University of Applied Sciences. 

The development took place in a time frame of around 8 weeks where the main goal was to create a 'Small' demo for a potential 'Big' game with the 'Boss Fighter' genre.

The team worked hard and we are happy to present to you what we have achieved within this experimental project

Tools used:

  • Jira
  • Unreal
  • Houdini
  • Maya
